add.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to put something with something else or with a group of other things
add.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: If the mixture seems dry, add water.
Do you want to add your name to the list?

add.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: if you add numbers or amounts together, you calculate their total
add.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: For tax purposes, your pension and earnings are added together.
Add £2.20 to the cost for postage.
add.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: to increase the amount or cost of something
add.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: Spell-checking your document adds time to the process.

add.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: to say more about something that has just been said

add a touch of glamour/class (to something)
